alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 12:47PM CST until January 03 at 4:36AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs. Williams Road east of Panama is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 30.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
